author: Michael K. Jones

review: I thought this was just a streaming device that you had to use your phone to watch Netflix and such, but it is built in like a regular Roku. I guess I did not read the full description. But, the only difference between the streaming stick and the Roku 3 is:-The processor on the 3 is 5x faster. Which I don't even know why this matters at all, maybe for using the thing Roku as a gaming device. But who does that-The roku 3 has a headphone jack in the controller, which could be useful if you have a spouse or kids, but I don't.-The roku 3 remote is a motion controller like a wii. If you want to play a game with a vii style remote, get a wii.
author: Ryan Hancock

review: Difficult to use remote in regards to searching using onscreen keyboard. I would recomend using the app. Stick works great though! Good buy happy with purchace.
author: jacob

review: I have Xfinity-Comcast cable internet and a Cisco router.  After spending over an hour with ROKU tech support rebooting, opening secret pages, and getting nowhere--they promised to call me back the next day with a fix.  They didn't.I chatted on line with ROKU support on the third day, and we spent another hour or more playing with my modem's DNS settings.  After that got us nowhere, I was told to call Comcast.  Many of you know where that can lead.I got the streaming stick because my Chromecast does not have a remote.  However, Chromecast worked out of the box with my internet connection, so three stars for Chromecast and one for Roku's stick.

review: Love this gadget.  Loaded the Roku remote to my iPhone (easier to search with keyboard on most channels).  This little stick fits all my needs.  I even dumped cable @ over $100/month.  Great decision.  I have had no issues.  Just plug in set up and start watching!  Roku should send me a commission as many people I know have purchased this on my recommendation.  Very easy to move between tvs.

review: Overall the stick is ok.  But Having the Roku 3 has spoiled me.  The stick is very sluggish.  Sometimes I have to repeatedly hit a button before anything happens.  But with the Roku 3, Its always very responsive.  Love the headset jack and usb port.  Just wish the usb port supported more video file formats.

review: Each time I use this device I love it more! It's not lightning fast when navigating through the menus and loading apps but it definitely exceeds the needs when playing stuff! The connectivity is pretty good (specially since it's dual band) and the remote feels perfect on your hands. Great selection of apps, no complains at all. You definitely get more than what you pay for.
